website_summaries.verdict: A dual hitch step that holds up well over time and comes with an innovative anti-rattle device.
pros: Made of steel with a black powder coat
cons: This step may be too expensive for those on a budget

customer_reviews.title: I live in in new york and parallel parking is bad for your bumper
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to keep people away from my bumper while parking behind me. I live in in new york and parallel parking is bad for your bumper. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Julio Soler

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and look good on 2017 Toyota Tacoma
customer_reviews.text: The product came quickly and installation was easy. It tools less than 10 minutes to install. However, because of the bad packaging, the two end finishing caps were missing and the storage bag was torn.
customer_reviews.author: htcn

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality BUT shim won't install
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a 5 except that the Shim wouldn't install the knob with the screw wouldn't thread. So it's installed and looks great but without the shim it rattles like pennies in a tin can. Wish it would have worked the way its supposed to. Update after leaving message requesting customer service to contact me to replace shim have heard nothing. No call No show! I get it they're busy and I am Customer 2,001 etc. That's okay it is what it is. I will step away from Go Rhino. Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: So it makes the bottom step less useful for me
customer_reviews.text: Overall a well built hitch step.. My only complaint is the spacing between the bar and the bottom step. It's much shorter than it looks in the pictures. I can't fully fit my foot between the bottom step and the bar. So it makes the bottom step less useful for me. It's not bad enough to return it.. But if you were hoping for 2 full steps like I was.... You might be disappointed. Other than that issue I'm happy with it. Looks good. Easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Kris H

customer_reviews.title: Good product but poor QA on final inspection and packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far, but was dissappointed by the packaging (weak) and the one screw that is messed up (holds the lower step on). One of the inserts / screws is jammed with the screw mostly out... can't screw it in or out. Also, the carry bag is torn up from the poor packing / rough handling. BUT, the step does work and looks great on my Jeep Cherokee.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... purpose of people not tapping into my bumper its great and kind of intimidating
customer_reviews.text: For looks and the purpose of people not tapping into my bumper its great and kind of intimidating . I personally don’t use it as a step . On the negative , as expected you have to allow for a little more room when you park and the bigger nuisance would be if you did grocery shopping and placing bags in the rear cargo area , you tend to hit your shins as your thing to get close and load your packages , Find yourself loading from the sides of the hitch but looks great functions as I purposely bought it for and pretty tough , not cheaply made .
customer_reviews.author: innocenzo j ciorra

customer_reviews.title: Nice item overall, but packaging and fit/finish not the best. Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Good bar, but don't know if its a seller/shipping problem or manufacturer problem. I saw another review that was similar in damage done to item. Mine arrived with coating on receiver area chipped off and squared off portion bent slightly. the carrying bag was torn in 3 places, making it unusable and ugly. The box it came in was torn and scuffed. Had the packaging included Styrofoam, I'm sure the damage would have been limited. Its usable for 99$, but definitely no quality control here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started out bad but was made good!
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered to me in a factory sealed box. I opened it, took the step out of the box and installed it into my hitch. The step was crooked as could be. When the thing was made it was not lined up correctly and it was welded. Don't know how it made it out of the factory in such bad shape. Quality Control, not. I am giving it a 5 star rating only for the reason of Go Rhino made it right with me and sent me a new one at no charge. And this one is straight.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kinslow

customer_reviews.title: Tow Hitch Step
customer_reviews.text: This works for reaching in the bed over the tailgate easier. I'll use as needed. It's a slide in hitch super easy to use. It has a stabilizer or anti rattle screw also. FOLLOW UP: I left the step installed while going to the dump. Backing up, the F-150 with rear warning alarm and camera, caused the WARNING BUZZER to alarm. With out using the anti rattle, the step is super sloppy. I had no problem using the left and right side of the step (wobble) to lean in the bed and tie and untie the tarp rope.
customer_reviews.author: kindleuser

customer_reviews.title: this is the second one i ve bought
customer_reviews.text: the first one got hit several times ie rear ended or someone that tried to fit into a too tight of a spot well when i was hit from behind no damge to the rear bumper this took the punishment and the other time im guessing someone forced their way into a too tight of a spot protected the rear bumper from any damage and made it a lot easier to get in or out of the rear of the 4wd pickup also the first one except for being bent looked reasonably good considering it was there for over six years i recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: domenico mirante jr

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so i could unload items form my bed easier but it is now garbage. The step is now bent at the hitch adapter. I have used this as you normally would and it is breaking at the welds, that are also rusting I weigh 174 lbs so this is not an overweight issue, this is poor quality for what i paid. Too late to return to Amazon as defective so im stuck with a 120.00 piece of scrap metal that I can do nothing with. Guess this company does not stand behind the product they distribute
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Its definitely love! I can now reach into the bed of ...
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely love! I can now reach into the bed of my husbands Tundra without having to climb or beg him to get the items out for me. Im 135 lbs and feel super safe on it. I don't remember the weight limit but it definitely feels sturdy. And the price was a complete deal sealer for us ;) ETA that we got rear ended while this step was on the truck. The step was only cosmetically damaged and our truck wasn’t even surface scratched while the vehicle that hit us needed a new bumper. This step is amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby H.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: step
customer_reviews.text: it's welded a little crooked . I would have sent it back but it's been sitting around for too long . I just put it on 7/15/19 and it sits lopsided . I have other steps , tried them , they sit even . oh well , I don't have ocd so I guess it's good enough !
customer_reviews.author: John P. Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Makes the trailhawk KL really stand out
customer_reviews.text: Love the look it gives the 2019 KL in the back. I added 2mm foam sheet in between hitch receiver and hitch step to fully minimize rattling & get a super tight fit. This step makes it way easier for loading and unloading kayak onto my crossbars. Great value for the price, easy way to make your car a little more rugged looking and as an added benefit serves to protect your bumper a bit
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: you get better coverage than most bumper hitches of this type
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quick 'insta-bumper' just to temporarily protect the rear of a Toyota FJ Cruiser, and this is just the right item to keep tailgating idiots in Nashville (and there are plenty of them) from dinging the back end, it's a genuinely solid and solid-looking bumper. At 36" in length and with a 2" steel tube diameter, you get better coverage than most bumper hitches of this type. It will do the trick in a light to moderate fashion until I get a more substantial full off-road bumper in place, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: OK So Far
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Clearly it had been repackaged, and there was a hole in the black bag, but after reading the earlier reviews I was expecting it. All the parts were there (including the end caps) and it took me about 10 minutes to install, including the shim (I had to put the rubber shim cap on the shim toward the front of the truck in order for it to fit correctly.) All the holes fit, and I will be getting a locking pin later. I have a 2017 Tundra with a 2 inch receiver. Hopefully this will help to protect my bumper some when I park at curb.
customer_reviews.author: congakong

customer_reviews.title: Really Nicely Made. Just What I Needed.
customer_reviews.text: I like this for climbing in and out of the back of my SUV to put one of my kids in his 3rd row car seat. He is 2 and insists on getting up and down himself now that I put this in. I wish the lower step had a bigger gab between it and the top one because I feel like my foot might get stuck when I use it so I just use the upper step which isn't much higher. I also feel like this will offer good protection for my vehicle if I get rear-ended.
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but strong. Great for loading Kayaks.
customer_reviews.text: Useful for loading kayaks. Should have thought about the loss of clearance space though. Lightly hit the bottom once or twice going up a couple steep driveways. Might have gone with the other hitch step without the extra lower step. Overall though I like it a lot and it’s light enough to easily take it off/put it on quickly, but strong enough to avoid a fender bender. Slight wobble when standing on it but no noise with the rattle reducer piece in place.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Another poorly fabricated chinese piece of junk. Not worth the money. Plastic ends not aluminum. Rattles a lot. Anti rattle system not usable as n doesnt work
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: A few days after installation I noticed that one of ...
customer_reviews.text: A few days after installation I noticed that one of the end caps was missing from the larger diameter tube. I can't say weather it was missing upon receipt or it was lost after installation. I contacted the manufacturer about the possibility of obtaining a replacement end cap. A week has passed without a response from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Ole Emil

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Toyota Highlander
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit in Toyota Highlander 2” receiver. Tried two and had to return both. The hitch is slightly too large to fit receiver. Basically it is a manufacturing defect that probably impacted whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. RH RYan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the material quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm leaving this review after having the step for about a year. Very disappointed in the material quality. The step is great, and has looked good but it's starting to rust. Seems like stainless shouldn't rust... Now, I do live in crappy Ohio, so rust is always expected. But come on, this is supposed to be stainless and it wasn't cheap!
customer_reviews.author: J. Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Stainless rear step bumper!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Highly polished. After a year it is holding up well with no rust!!! Welding is good quality wit no pitting or holes, Gives some protection in parking lots etc. I had another one that was hit in a very slow speed rear crash and it save the rear of my nissan xterra, I only had to replace the Rhino and the trailer plug. Better the Rhino than the whole rear of your car.
customer_reviews.author: william 111

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bumper, but missing parts...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bumper that I ordered but the problem is the parts are missing like bolts and lock, specifically missing anti-rattle strap, clamp washer, hitch pin, hitch pin clip, etc . If you can send the missing parts I would really appreciate it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Wong Yat Pun Chong

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed when try to use the first step is that it was probably designed for someone with a size 4 shoe. The step has only 3 1/2 inches of tread. I increased the tread to 4 3/4 by turning it around (see images). Unfortunately, without tapping 4 new screw positions the tread step slightly tilted backwards. It works but needs a simple modification.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beyond my expectations! The quality top & very sturdy! The box was damaged when it arrived but the item was not since it was securely wrapped and protected in a cloth storage bag. The bag will be nice to use when the step is not on the truck. Perfect size for the tail gate & fits well with the look of the truck. The added step is perfect for the height of a Dodge Ram 3500 Double Cab Duly. Definitely helps to get up to reach over tail gate. However mine arrived as all black not the added silver piece as shown but like it better as one color! Perfect gift for my Dad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GO RHINO D360T step
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty heavy duty thou a bit overpriced. They should’ve included a key locking pin for this price. The bag it came in is torn up as previous reviewers wrote and pretty much useless. The anti rattle doesn’t work much at all and still loose a bit. Depending on how it rattles when on the road I might just return.
customer_reviews.author: Pipo13

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit into the receiver.
customer_reviews.text: Great look and keeps the others away when parked in the city. The fit into the receiver is very loose. They supply an anti-rattle screw plate but it’s not very effective. It would seem they should simply redesign for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Protect My Bumper
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I have been rear ended 4 times in the last 10 years. I was looking for something to protect my bumper. This looks nice, and is heavy duty will serve the purpose. Over all quality is ok, as other readers pointed out welds are ugly could be a whole lot neater. Wrapped with tape to keep sturdy. looks good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shortman

customer_reviews.title: Go Rhino saved my rear end!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the flat black as a replacement for a chrome GoRhino I had on my Yukon before i got rear ended and it got mangled. It saved me hundreds of dollars in damage to my truck. You should have seen the guys car that hit me it was a mess. The step feature makes it easy to reach stuff in my trunk. Great quality makes the Go rhino brand my go to if i ever need another replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kalmar

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic Welding Job
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a 2 year old child welded it together. The most pathetic job I have ever seen. Plus it arrived damaged. What a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Strong rear step.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase, my rear bumper is not that strong, this will help if cars get too close when my truck is parked so I dont get hit and it will help in a rear end collision too, and makes it easier to climb to the bed, like my wife that she is short, lowest price compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: tony olivares

customer_reviews.title: Street parking armor!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super heavy duty, it has protected my truck from people bumping me while it is parked on the street. It has a couple different holes on the sides for adjustment and a anti rattle device. It also works as a step but more as protection for SUV’s
customer_reviews.author: BIG NATE AKA BULLY

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this item
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item, really dresses up the rear of our Honda Pilot. I swapped the spare doughnut tire for a full size so it hangs down a little below bumper cover, this step covers tire, acts as a functional step to easily reach the roof and protects from minor rear end bumps. I have received many cool factor comments from the guys too.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Item came in as a retaped, possible return. Mud in grooves. Tighter for anti rattle didt tighten and unit wobbled. I didnt opt for a used, resold item so it was returned. Not happy that it wasnt a new unit.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy step
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase due to some of the other reviews I've read, but I am very pleased with the step. Fits great and looks like it belongs there. Will come in handy on long trips when I need to access the roof basket.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Hiltabidle

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good and Useful Step
customer_reviews.text: I give 4 stars because the box came in broken. However, there was no damage to the item. It’s easy to install and took me about 10 minutes. It’s not sturdy as I thought when I stepped on it but it look great and useful to access my truck bed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice. I do agree that the lower step could have been further outward to allow for a natural step up. Other than that, buy it and you’ll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and solidly built. Slightly crooked.
customer_reviews.text: Hefty and quite functional as a step. Nice black powder coat finish. Slightly crooked, which I've found to be an issue with nearly all hitch steps from all manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great step
customer_reviews.text: Hubby used on a trip as a step to get into truck with the tailgate up. Slept in there, not worried someone would steal his step ladder. Worked great
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the unit looks. Truly it could be a wider, maybe about a foot wider. The anti rattle bracket could use a bit of work. It definitely reduces the rattle but not perfectly. Overall im happy.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is Crap but Step is good.
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is great. No complaints there. Knly thing was the stablizer bar needs to be filed where you put the screw through it. The packaging and shipping is AWFUL....the product was just allowed to bounce around and destroy the box and cloth cover.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac G

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but uneven
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my truck but isn't even. The left side sits slightly lower than the right. I'll probably have to try to make some adjustments to try to even it out.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my Tundra , had a little problem with the rattling but bought a separate piece for a few $ and now It's solid as a rock overall great product and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Davide Scarsini

customer_reviews.title: Sets off 2019 Ram 1500 sensors
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking step. Wish it would have worked for me but set off back-up sensors immediately and nonstop on 2019 Ram 1500.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Nami

customer_reviews.title: The only thing it is good for, if someone hits you from behind
customer_reviews.text: Made cheap! Pitted on bottom and faded on both sides of the bottom step rails. End caps not cut right. Shows a little of round medal edges. If you can live with that it's ok. The only thing it is good for, if someone hits you from behind. It will protect some or all your bumper from damage. Sent first order back and reorder from different vendor . Not much differents in step defects from the first . So I notified vendor, but on reply ! So I live with it. I recommend if you are going to purchase this step. Go all black. Jeff
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fits like it should
customer_reviews.text: Fits like it should. Bottom steps make it easy to get up to back of truck after hip replacement. Looking at adding lights should not be a big deal.Truck is set up for them. The big test will be when someone hits it,hope it never happens but will write review if it does. Swapping it out for carrier or for towing is a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Tailgate
customer_reviews.text: Okay, firstly... if it arrives broken/damaged then your bad review doesn’t count. So.. mine arrived fine, worked fine, looked fine and saved my tail gate. I got hit by a Toyota Camry going ~35. The step got wrecked and the rear bumper got dented. That’s it. Oh and the Camrys totaled. Spend 100 and have a dented bumper Or Replace your entire rear if you get hit I’m buying another now
customer_reviews.author: shane nystrom

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my truck
customer_reviews.text: I received this hitch step yesterday, and immediately installed it. It went on very nicely, with no problems. I have an '07 Silverado with a factory tow package. No back-up sensors. There is a little side to side movement, but nothing that is an issue. I would recommend this product to anyone with a similar vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Rear Hitch Attachment
customer_reviews.text: If you want to add a little extra gusto when not pulling a trailer the Dominator Hitch Step is the way to go. Blocks your hitch, adds a little extra protection and gives you a step up at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt look like it is of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt look like it is of good quality. I do like the design. But it is bent on one end.
customer_reviews.author: Caramel

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bumper protection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for extra bumper protection. Have to be careful though when using as a step because it doesn’t fit snug in my 2” hitch. So, when using the step it moves back and forth a bit, which could cause someone to slip and fall. Like it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bohanan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and strong.
customer_reviews.text: This bumper saved me in a rear end collision. Still have it on the truck and it got hit pretty hard pushing my truck forward and preventing anyone from ruining the bumper. Also makes it very easy to get into the bed and out
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jared

customer_reviews.title: Safey
customer_reviews.text: Love THE PROTECTION FROM REAR END COLLISIONS.... BOUGHT ONE FOR WIFE'S LAND CRUISER...SAVES LOTS OS $$$$$$ IF REAR ENDED...
customer_reviews.author: CONSERVATIVE

customer_reviews.title: however still an awesome product. Does not rattle at all on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought used and had a small crack in the plastic step cover, however still an awesome product. Does not rattle at all on my 2017 Ford Edge with the standard 2" receiver. Looks awesome and does not stick out too far from the back but will protect me from rear ending and people backing up to close in parking lots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time. The box it came it was OK. Easy install and came with everything you need. I did find a little rust on the inside of the hitch were the powdered did not cover.. Fits nicely and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Swazzie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Strong
customer_reviews.text: My hubby bought this step for me as a gift. Yeah. Installation was quick. He looked at several different types and brands. This one looks great on my pickup AND it has 2 steps instead of 1 high one, good quality, strong and adds extra protection to the rear of my pickup. It is stable to step on once you add the stabilizer piece on underside. It says optional. NOPE. If you do not put it on it wiggles quite a bit. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Looks good for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my 2004 Jeep Grand Cherokee WJ and it is a Really cool product and it looks nice too. I have a roof rack for my Jeep and this definitely helps me load stuff up there instead of having to Climb up from the back seat entrance. The stabilizer piece that comes with this is very helpful but on my specific hitch receiver, it bumps heads with the chain connectors on my receiver. It still works fine but it’s something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: James Becker

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install the internal screw to hold the bolt was not centered to the hole so I had to make some adjustments to it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco C

customer_reviews.title: Great Step and Bumper Protector
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was damaged but the seller did an excellent job correcting the problem. I've put this on the 5th wheel hauler and it makes for a solid step up into the bed of the truck. It also acts as a bumper protector if rear ended.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Great “StepHitch”
customer_reviews.text: This product is used for a Honda Ridgeline truck so the ball hitch could be removed and put away. The ball hitch was being used primarily as a step since we are not towing a lot any longer. Works great and I like the width as it also serves as a bumper guard.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great on FJ
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived the bottom step plate was missing in the order. I reached out to Go Rhino directly, they had me confirm my purchase and mailed the plate immediately. This is very sturdy and looks great on my FJ. I purchased this so I can step up while lifting my kayak onto the top of my truck, it's very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: D360PS Dominator Polished Stainless Steel HitchStep for 2" Receivers
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Was I shocked at the size and quality of this product. The photo is deceiving. Didn't know if the length would be 12 inches or 24 inches even though the specs said it would be 3 feet. I took a gamble. Not only is it as advertised, it was carefully packed and shipped. All the joints are welded nicely. It looks amazing! And delivery was faster than expected. Overall, I am super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Espana

customer_reviews.title: Love Go Rhino
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second Go Rhino .. had one on my Nissan Frontier and now for my Toyota Tundra. They are amazing and does really help protecting your rear bumper.
customer_reviews.author: JoeL

customer_reviews.title: Secure Feeling Stepping up or down
customer_reviews.text: I love this new hitch step. I can now climb in and out of the bed of the truck without hurting myself. I am going to add a rubber gasket to make the fit a bit tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it on his F250. After knee and ankle surgeries it makes it much easier to up in the bed of the truck. Well made and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful bar but!!!
customer_reviews.text: Here is why I gave is only 3 stars. I was expecting it to be a tighter fit and not move so much. It would also be more beautiful if it came with a LED light or some kind of break light but I couldn't find one that did. Also there is not enough space to step on both pieces. Your feet would have to be pretty small to do so. It's great protection if you back up and tap something or if someone runs into or tap you. As a plus it also gives my Yukon a exotic but yet rugged look
customer_reviews.author: Dean C. Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Not made right
customer_reviews.text: Bottom step is made slanted down at such an angle it’s useless. Doesn’t even have a drop. Wobbles all over the place doesn’t fit into hitch advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that meets all my requirements. Great looking, functional, and affordable. Amazon won’t let me add pics but it’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Devilfish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Put some red/white reflective tape and it discourages tailgaters ... 😎
customer_reviews.author: Xeno

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item so called stainless steel started to rust within two week of install especially around the weld connections for the bottom step. would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: billy kresge

customer_reviews.title: very strong build quality
customer_reviews.text: very nice product! seems very stong, it would save you alot of money if you where rear ended! looks great! yes it rattles alittle but its totally worth the 100$ i recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great rear bumper
customer_reviews.text: Works great on back of my truck. Easy to install sturdy. Good quality. These are worth the money especially if you are rear ended
customer_reviews.author: Oman

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2017 Toyota 4Runner
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome on my blacked out 2017 Toyota 4Runner SR5. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Diffie

customer_reviews.title: Good Strong Product
customer_reviews.text: The product looks nice and serves it's purpose as a step and protective device for the back bumper. Glad I bought it and I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Badyl

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, Well Built Step Hitch
customer_reviews.text: This step hitch looks good and performs as expected. There have been more than a few negative reviews here... Granted there could be production inconsistencies, however for the price and weight, this step hitch seems well built and capable.
customer_reviews.author: AmaCustFlorida

customer_reviews.title: poor finish and shipping.
customer_reviews.text: the end caps looked damaged or just poorly made. and the box was ripped open and. looked returned. I may not keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Capuano

customer_reviews.title: My SIX is covered😁
customer_reviews.text: Bought as step up, but also protection from rear impact. Does interfere with back up sensors, but will adjust or turn off. Back up camera ok.
customer_reviews.author: Dunjo

customer_reviews.title: Rear Accident Protection
customer_reviews.text: If you have a tow hitch....this is a MUST HAVE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pangster

customer_reviews.title: kirk
customer_reviews.text: looks good it will save my bumper if some one gets to close to my truck step is cheaper than a bumper
customer_reviews.author: kirk

customer_reviews.title: 2" tube is welded out of square.
customer_reviews.text: Plan on modification for it to be level with bumper.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my SUV so my kid can enter through the hatch to sit in the third row. Looks good and works well. The fit was loose but was taken care of by an anti-rattle device which I also purchased on Amazon. Four stars because the box it came in (From Rhino) was thrashed.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy build, but not tight fit, adaptor to prevent vibration is not effective.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as one would expect
customer_reviews.text: Too loose even with the wedge. Not very sturdy when I step on it. Good looking and would save your bumper but best to take care when stepping on it when getting into the bed
customer_reviews.author: Indigenous genius

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the overall design and look
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ronshaugen

customer_reviews.title: Look Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels sturdy. Knocked a star because it didnt come with a pin. Did anyone else have this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Mandibee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Works just like advertised. Plus, it is solid and sticks out a bit so it protects my bumper!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love the bracket it comes with to stop the rattling. Looks pretty bad ass. I park on the streets and this stops people from parking too close.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Every where else this sells for $200 it is a great addition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. Very well made and packaged by manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Very well made and packaged by manufacturer, although Amazon didn't do a good job. Looks great on the truck, doesn't rattle and doesn't wobble. Have gotten compliments on it. If this is the sort of thing you're looking for, you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gannet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for access to bed with tailgate up and hopefully ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for access to bed with tailgate up and hopefully will keep any damage from things hitting the bumper or worse the tailgate!
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: This was the second time I bought this product. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the second time I bought this product. The first purchase was in ruin after protecting my bumper one hot summer night from an overly aggressive motorist who puts on its gas pedal in a haste after a stop.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde D

customer_reviews.title: Sum BADA#S rear protection
customer_reviews.text: Just got a new 2013 Tacoma was looking for something not only to dress up the back but to add to the protection . This bar comes black or polished stainless i chose the stainless it matched the factory steps and the Buck Bar up front. came quickly and the install it just minutes this hands down is the best looking step currently on the market today and priced right as well so if your looking to cover your A#S stick this in and your covered
customer_reviews.author: Rick East Branch ny

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great comes with anti rattle part but so-so. Wish they made one with third step as lifted trucks could use it for step and vehicle stop and or ball attachments
customer_reviews.author: Captain Bill

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: No problems installing. Little smaller than I had hoped but still happy with it. Does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Revan J Nix

customer_reviews.title: The step did a fantastic job tearing up her grill and protecting my bumper
customer_reviews.text: Not two weeks after I purchased this incredible device, some distracted(cell phone) young lady rear-ended me, in a Toyota Corolla, at a stop light. The step did a fantastic job tearing up her grill and protecting my bumper! Not a scratch on my truck or the step, save for the slight 10* angle that the step now rests at. Looks great & it will protect your truck, buy this!
customer_reviews.author: TravisT.

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2019 Ram Long Horn Laramie the chrome step was on my bumper back up sensors and I have a dog that’s always on the way other than that it’s nice.

customer_reviews.title: What is exactly what I ordered and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: What is exactly what I ordered and fits perfect love it

customer_reviews.text: unfortunately the anti-shake part it doesn't fit or mine was defective, came in a broken box inside of another much much bigger broken box

customer_reviews.title: Protection from rear collision
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on our SUV, busy traffic area and it's already been ran into. It saved my SUV from damage and is now just a little crooked and scuffed but the plastic bumper is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.ByrdE

product_meta.title: Go Rhino D360T Textured Black Powder Coat Finish Universal Dominator Hitch Step for 2" Recievers
product_meta.description: Color:Textured BlackThis hitch step has the same great aggressive styling of our popular dominator side steps with a dual step design and foot pads that provide sure footing.
feature_bullets: Includes anti-rattle device and a convenient black storage bag
New punched aluminum step pad matches current Dominator style step pads
Dual step for hard-to-reach storage areas or racks are now easily accessible
Manufactured of the highest quality steel for unmatched strength and durability
Textured black powder coat with a 5 year warranty
Construction- Mild steel, Product Notes- 36in long
